children.text: Acne Treatment in Pune - Clear Skin, Real Confidence with The Skin Firm
Expert dermatologist-led solutions for pimples, acne scars & breakouts.

Acne is a common skin condition that occurs when hair follicles get clogged with oil, dead skin cells, and bacteria. This leads to pimples, blackheads, whiteheads, or deeper, painful bumps that may cause scarring or pigmentation if left untreated.
Large, painful lumps under the skin (nodules)
Dark spots or scars after breakouts

FAQs on Acne Treatment in Pune

items.question: How long does an acne treatment session last?

children.text: Minimal to none; only slight redness or peeling in some cases.
Noticeable improvement in 2-3 weeks; best results after completing your plan.

items.question: How many sessions do I need?

children.text: Usually 4-8 sessions spaced 2-4 weeks apart, depending on severity.

items.question: Is acne treatment safe for darker skin tones?

children.text: Yes-our treatments are safe and customised for all skin tones.
